languages.text: "Даже среди тех, кто делит с нами убежище, есть признаки порчи. Я думала, что это закономерный ход вещей среди вашего народа — ранний рассвет, быстрое старение и потом гниение заживо год от года".

traits.locale_text: "Даже среди тех, кто делит с нами убежище, есть признаки порчи. Я думала, что это закономерный ход вещей среди вашего народа — ранний рассвет, быстрое старение и потом гниение заживо год от года".

languages.text: "There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated ageing, and then rotting alive year after year."
languages.original_text: "Даже среди тех, кто делит с нами убежище, есть признаки порчи. Я думала, что это закономерный ход вещей среди вашего народа — ранний рассвет, быстрое старение и потом гниение заживо год от года".

traits.locale_text: "There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated aging, and then rotting alive year after year."

"There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated aging, and then rotting alive year after year."

"There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated aging, and then rotting alive year after year."

"There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated ageing, and then rotting alive year after year."

languages.text: “就连那些与我们同住在避难所的同胞们，也呈现出了腐化的迹象。我本以为我们的人生历程就是这样的——年纪轻轻即踏上巅峰，随后以极快的速度衰老，之后年复一年地朽烂。”
languages.original_text: "There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated ageing, and then rotting alive year after year."

traits.locale_text: “就连那些与我们同住在避难所的同胞们，也呈现出了腐化的迹象。我本以为我们的人生历程就是这样的——年纪轻轻即踏上巅峰，随后以极快的速度衰老，之后年复一年地朽烂。”

languages.text: 「私たちの隠れ家で共に暮らす人々にも腐朽の徴候がでている。アエルダリにしてみれば、自然なことだと思っていたが――早くに迎えた全盛期、加速する老い、それから年々朽ちてゆく様を」
languages.original_text: "There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated ageing, and then rotting alive year after year."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの隠れ家で共に暮らす人々にも腐朽の徴候がでている。アエルダリにしてみれば、自然なことだと思っていたが――早くに迎えた全盛期、加速する老い、それから年々朽ちてゆく様を」

languages.text: "Es gibt sogar Zeichen der Verderbtheit bei einigen, die unsere Zuflucht teilen. Ich hielt es für den natürlichen Weg bei unseresgleichen – früh erwachsen, beschleunigte Alterung und dann Jahr um Jahr bei lebendigem Leib verrotten."
languages.original_text: "There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated ageing, and then rotting alive year after year."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt sogar Zeichen der Verderbtheit bei einigen, die unsere Zuflucht teilen. Ich hielt es für den natürlichen Weg bei unseresgleichen – früh erwachsen, beschleunigte Alterung und dann Jahr um Jahr bei lebendigem Leib verrotten."

languages.text: « On voit même des signes de corruption parmi ceux qui partagent notre refuge. Je pensais que c'était une évolution naturelle chez les individus de votre espèce : ils atteignent la fleur de l'âge tôt, puis vieillissent rapidement et se détériorent d'année en année. »
languages.original_text: "There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated ageing, and then rotting alive year after year."

traits.locale_text: « On voit même des signes de corruption parmi ceux qui partagent notre refuge. Je pensais que c'était une évolution naturelle chez les individus de votre espèce : ils atteignent la fleur de l'âge tôt, puis vieillissent rapidement et se détériorent d'année en année. »

languages.text: «Hay signos de corrupción incluso entre los habitantes de nuestro refugio. Pensé que ese era el curso natural de nuestra gente: madurar pronto, envejecer rápidamente y después pudrirse en vida año tras año».
languages.original_text: "There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated ageing, and then rotting alive year after year."

traits.locale_text: «Hay signos de corrupción incluso entre los habitantes de nuestro refugio. Pensé que ese era el curso natural de nuestra gente: madurar pronto, envejecer rápidamente y después pudrirse en vida año tras año».

languages.text: "Bize sığınanlar arasında bile yozlaşma bulguları var. Türümüzün doğası gereğidir sandım: Hayatın baharına erken girer, hızlı yaşlanırız, sonra da yıllar geçtikçe daha yaşarken çürümeye başlarız."
languages.original_text: "There are even signs of corruption among those who share our refuge. I thought it was the natural way of things for our kind — an early prime, accelerated ageing, and then rotting alive year after year."

traits.locale_text: "Bize sığınanlar arasında bile yozlaşma bulguları var. Türümüzün doğası gereğidir sandım: Hayatın baharına erken girer, hızlı yaşlanırız, sonra da yıllar geçtikçe daha yaşarken çürümeye başlarız."
